com.dhemery.configuring

Class TransformingConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dhemery.core.Named
      • com.dhemery.configuring.TransformingConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configuration

    public class TransformingConfiguration
extends Named
implements Configuration
    A configuration that applies a sequence of operators when an option is queried.

    Each call to an option() method applies the configuration operators before applying any query operators.

    The configuration operators do not affect the values stored in the configuration. The operators are applied only by the option() methods.

    Changes to the configuration are written through to the underlying dictionary. The dictionary's contents, and changes to its contents, are reflected in the configuration.

    See Also:
    ConfigurationBuilder
